personalInfo.splInterest: Ping Pong, movies, being outside with his dog

tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica by finishing T9 at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January... Bounced back from a missed cut at the season opening Avianca Colombia Open, with a victory at the Lexus Panama Classic. Was the only player to post four rounds under par at Buenaventura GC to finish at 12-under 276 in tough windy conditions. Entered the final round leading by one and stayed in front the entire day, sinking clutch par putts from 7 and 5 feet respectively on the 71st and 72nd holes to win by one over Emilio “Puma” Domínguez.
tourBios.carHigh: Played on the EGolf Tour and the NGA Tour 2011-2014
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at UT Chattanooga... Won the Tennessee Open in 2007 and the Tennessee Amateur Championship in 2008.
tourBios.personal: Put his career on hold for six months in 2015 to caddie for his wife, Brooke, who is a professional golfer on the LPGA Tour... Graduated from UT Chattanooga with a degree in Criminal Justice in 2010… Attended Soddy Daisy HS, where he was named All-District in basketball three times scoring 1,358 career points and All-District and All-Region in baseball as a senior… Has one brother, David… Twitter name is @derek_rende
